name: 3Dator
pre_gcode: G28 Z0  ;move Z to min endstops
G28 X0 Y0  ;move X/Y to min endstops
; PLEASE CHECK: G1 Z0.6 F{speed_travel} ;move the Nozzle near the Bed
G1 X10 E30 F500  ;printing a Line from right to left
G92 E0  ;zero the extruded length again
M117 Printing...;Put printing message on LCD screen
M150 R255 U255 B255 P4 ;Change LED Color to white
post_gcode: M140 S0                     ;heated bed heater off (if you have it)
G1 E-1 F300                            ;retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
; PLEASE CHECK: G1 Z+0.5 E-5 X-20 Y-20 F{speed_travel} ;move Z up a bit and retract filament even more
G28                          ;move X/Y to min endstops, so the head is out of the way
